detectors.description:
Exclastic.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#14-82) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 2000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#16)
detectors.markdown:
[Exclastic.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#L14-L82) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [initialSupply = 2000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#L16)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#4)
	- Exclastic.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#23-25)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#5)
	- Exclastic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#29-31)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#6)
	- Exclastic.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#33-35)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Exclastic.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#66-70)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#8)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#9)
	- Exclastic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Exclastic.sol#37-47)
